content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or feelings. However, I can say in general terms that Fortnite's impact on kids has been a topic of debate and controversy, with some parents and experts blaming the game for contributing to addictive behavior, aggression in children, and causing issues with socialization and other areas of life.

On the other hand, supporters argue that Fortnite can have a positive impact on children in terms of developing skills such as teamwork, communication, and problem-solving.

It is important for parents to monitor their children's gameplay and ensure they are playing appropriate games in moderation. Additionally, parents can also encourage their children to engage in a range of activities outside of gaming to maintain a healthy balance in their lives.
